name: Pizzapaking
description:
Today you are in charge of everything! 

You and, well, an oven that can cook, pack, and deliver pizza.

So, what you have to do? Nothing! Literally throw them in there!

Game developed for Quarantine Jam 

By Jari Tarabelli (solo dev) and Ylenia Tarabelli (arts)

I don't own the rights to the background music.
